data.name: Fruit Juice
data.detailed_description:
About

Players run a beverage shop in the game. Need to use different fruit juices to make juices to sell to customers and earn money. You can pass the customs clearance by meeting the business target.

First, you need to order for your guests.
Second, you need to recommend the nuts mixed with the drink for your guests to maximize the income of individual guests.
Then, you need to finish the drink making within a certain amount of time.
Finally, you need to do cashier and change.

After each day's business is completed, you will summarize your day's business.

Feature

The difficulty of the game increases dramatically as the levels increase, making it ideal for those who are more than willing to challenge themselves.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(r) Core (TM)2 CPU -T7200 @ 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Raedon X1600 / Nvidia GeForce 8600M GT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
